departments_detailed.title: Detailed Department Information
departments_detailed.content:
DEPARTMENTS AT SATI:

- ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE: Artificial Intelligence - Samrat Ashok Technological Institute, Vidisha
- APPLIED SCIENCE ALL/CHEMICAL ENGINEERING: Applied Chemistry - Samrat Ashok Technological Institute, Vidisha
- APPLIED SCIENCE ALL/APPLIED MATHEMATICS: Applied Mathematics - Samrat Ashok Technological Institute, Vidisha
- APPLIED SCIENCE ALL/APPLIED PHYSICS: Applied Physics - Samrat Ashok Technological Institute, Vidisha
- CIVIL ENGINEERING: Civil Engineering - Samrat Ashok Technological Institute, Vidisha
- COMPUTER SCIENCE ENGINEERING: Computer Science - Samrat Ashok Technological Institute, Vidisha
- ELECTRICAL ENGINEERING: Electrical Engineering - Samrat Ashok Technological Institute, Vidisha
- ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING: Electronics Engineering - Samrat Ashok Technological Institute, Vidisha
- HUMANITIES: Humanities - Samrat Ashok Technological Institute, Vidisha
- INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY: Information Technology - Samrat Ashok Technological Institute, Vidisha
- MANAGEMENT STUDIES: Management Studies - Samrat Ashok Technological Institute, Vidisha
- MECHANICAL ENGINEERING: Mechanical Engineering - Samrat Ashok Technological Institute, Vidisha
- CYBER SECURITY IOT: Cyber Security & IoT - Samrat Ashok Technological Institute, Vidisha

Each department has dedicated faculty, laboratories, and research facilities.
